forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning. A few showers developing during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
